NG0220:1: phye gsum thun gsum khrag gsum brdeg pa'i rdzas //
NG0220:2: skyer tsher rten la thod pa dar gyis dgab //
NG0220:3: gsal ba zhag dgu dmod pa dbab //
NG0220:4: brgya brgya bzlas shing thun khrag dag la bstim //
NG0220:5: drag sngags bskul bas dug mda' khog du skyel //
NG0220:6: rtsa gcod khong khrag skam nas shes pa 'pho //
NG0220:7: sngags kyi grangs las tshad kyi sbyor ba min //
NG0220:8: drag tu bskul gyin thod khrag zor du 'phung *//
NG0220:9: thod pa'i pra ngan drag po sngags kyis bzlog / lus bskyod rngam tshig sgra dang bcas pas bya //
NG0220:10: dregs pas bskyod cing rngam pas yul la 'phro //
NG0220:11: drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di lta ste //
NG0220:12: e ka ya ma srog la dza mugs thun rbad b+h+yo /
NG0220:13: rtsa khrag rtsal breng shag thun rbad b+h+yo /
NG0220:14: ra ma snying rtsa hur yam thun rbad b+h+yo /
NG0220:15: rtsa khrag khram shig thun rbad b+h+yo /
NG0220:16: gsad pa gsum sbrel drag po sngags //
NG0220:17: gnyis sbrel mtha' gsum sbyor ba man //
NG0220:18: rig pas brtag la sdebs kyi sbyor ba blang *//
NG0220:19: rig pa gsum dang ldan pa lnga ru bya //
NG0220:20: gsang ba las kyi rim pa bsdeb dang sbyar /
NG0220:21: sbyor ba gab pa'i snying po gsad pa yin //
NG0220:22: drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:23: sbyor ba drag po'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ///
NG0220:24: / gzhan yang lo thog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste //
NG0220:25: dur khrod ras sam shog gu gru bzhi la //
NG0220:26: dbus su rus sbal lto ba stong par bri //
NG0220:27: 'khor lo rtsibs chen bcu gnyis dag dang ldan //
NG0220:29: dbab pa'i sngags bzhi chu dril zor thogs gzar //
NG0220:30: gta' ma thod pa 'dra gnyis gcig dang gsum //
NG0220:31: khrag lnga so lnga 'bru gsum thal //
NG0220:32: rten gnyis 'bru gsum tshil gsum dang *//
NG0220:33: bla gnas yul rten 'dug pa thod pa'i rten //
NG0220:34: sbyor ba gzhom phyir khrag dang dug gis gdab //
NG0220:35: dgu bdun lnga ru tha chung gsum dang sbyar //
NG0220:36: khri brgyad gang dmigs khri yis lam du gzhug / dmigs pa gsum gyis gnas yul rten la sbyar //
NG0220:37: chu rgod 'khyags pa ri ru rdib nas 'joms //
NG0220:38: drag sngags sbyor ba bzhi ru bsdeb //
NG0220:39: e ka ya ma pra ma srur ya bam /
NG0220:40: phrom phrom hril hril nyid 'dril phrom /
NG0220:41: hril shar shar yam yam 'ub hril b+h+yo /
NG0220:42: phrom shar shar b+hi ta rak+sha shar shar ram thun yam shar phob /
NG0220:43: na ga gzir nan dril phob /
NG0220:44: de ba yu nan gzir phob /
NG0220:46: si si ya ma tsa shu la gzir nan hril shar phob /
NG0220:48: lus dang yan lag 'dod par sbyar //
NG0220:49: drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:50: lo thog 'joms pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o //  // gzhan yang srung ba'i sbyor ba ni //
NG0220:51: rim pa brgyad dang ldan par bya //
NG0220:52: bshig pa 'khor lo gzugs dang brda //
NG0220:53: de bzhin gdug pa gzir ba gsum //
NG0220:54: kha bcing rang gzir sbyor ba mchog / drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba khyad par gyis //
NG0220:55: gzhan gyis sbyor ba bshig cing gnon byed @#//
NG0220:57: rgya shog dag la gang gnod gzugs de bri //
NG0220:58: snying gar snying po tha ma sngags kyis bskor //
NG0220:59: ga'u so sor bcug la gru gsum rtsang bcas brnag
NG0220:60: / mthing nag dur khrod dar ram re bas gtums
NG0220:61: // zhag gsum brabs la mtha' ru bka' rten gnan //
NG0220:62: gzugs la bshig pa'i sbyor ba dang po yin //
NG0220:63: dur khrod ras la snying po brda mid bri //
NG0220:64: sngags kyis bskor la dug chu tsha ba bsku //
NG0220:65: la cha'i ga'ur sbal pa'i lto bar bca' //
NG0220:66: zhag gsum thun bzhir brgya dang bcu ru brab //
NG0220:67: thon nas du bas bdugs la seng ge'i khog par gnan //
NG0220:68: brda la gshig pa'i sbyor ba gnyis pa'o //
NG0220:69: dur khrod ras la thig skor gsum du bya //
NG0220:70: dbus su gru gsum ming bcas 'khrul mig dug lnga'i sngags //
NG0220:71: yang logs rtsibs bcur bshig pa'i spu gri dgod //
NG0220:72: rus sbal lto bar dug khrag tsha ba bsku //
NG0220:73: kha sbyar gong bzhin thod pa dong du gzhug / lha bsgom sngags bzlas yul la drag tu rbad //
NG0220:74: drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba gcig gis bya //
NG0220:75: e ka ya ma g+has ma dza nir ya /
NG0220:76: sarba sha trum stam b+ha ya nan 'brid rbad /
NG0220:77: 'khor los bshig pa'i sbyor ba gsum pa'o //
NG0220:78: gzhan yang klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa'i nad dar na //
NG0220:79: rgya shog dag la gzugs bri na ga sngags kyis bskor //
NG0220:80: nad khrag dug khrag tsha bas zhing ras gril //
NG0220:81: thod pa dong du mnol khrag zhag bdun brab //
NG0220:82: nya stong lha bsgom gzir sngags mtha' ru gnan //
NG0220:83: sa dang na ga su yi mtha' ru bri //
NG0220:84: brda dang ming sbel snying gzer sngags kyis bskor //
NG0220:85: gong bzhin sbyor ba phag thod chu mchog gnan //
NG0220:86: dur mched bka' rten gnod pa'i sa ru gnan //
NG0220:87: gzhan yang gdug pa gzir ba'i 'khor lo ni //
NG0220:88: dur khrod ras dang shog bu gru bzhi la //
NG0220:89: thig skor rim gsum dbus su sa na ga / 'khrul mig bzhi gnyis he b+ha rtsa ba'i sngags //
NG0220:90: rtsibs brgyad spu gris gdug pa'i zhen chags gcod //
NG0220:91: rus sbal la sogs khri brgyad mnol khrag brab //
NG0220:92: thon nas gzir zhing mtha' ru gnan pa bya //
NG0220:93: he b+ha ya ma thi pa ra ya /
NG0220:94: sa na ga snying gzer srog la myog rbad /
NG0220:95: sa na ga snying spur nan nan /
NG0220:96: gzhan yang gnod byed kha bcing ba //
NG0220:97: sbyor ba gzhan ming sngags kyis bya //
NG0220:98: sarba tsit+ta gzir thum big+h+nam nan /
NG0220:99: gzhan yang stobs kyis bdag po nang gzir na //
NG0220:100: rgya shog gzugs byas lto bar 'khor lo bca' //
NG0220:101: thig skor gsum ldan dbus su ya dang ka / 'khrul mig bcu la gshig pa'i spu gri dgod //
NG0220:102: mtha' ma'i bcu gnyis rtsibs la rang gzir rtsa ba'i sngags //
NG0220:103: dug khrag brab la rten gyi phur pas bsdig /
NG0220:104: rang nyid zil non dmigs pa gcer bur brtag /
NG0220:105: sngags bzlas dam bdar thun brad khrag gis brab //
NG0220:106: drag po thon nas zhag gsum gcig na phye'o //
NG0220:109: e ka ya ma g+ha dza ni ra ya /
NG0220:110: e ya hur thum sha trum 'drid khang shag ya ri /
NG0220:111: rang gi lus bsrung gzhan gyi sbyor ba dbral //
NG0220:112: mchog tu gsang ba rang gzir med pa'i gnas //
NG0220:113: drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:114: bsrung ba khyad par gyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o
NG0220:115: // // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag
NG0220:116: sngags dbang sdud kyi sbyor ba 'di gsungs so //
NG0220:117: srid pa las kyi mtha' sdud du //
NG0220:118: dbang sdud las kyi 'khor lo brtag / las kyi tshe bdag lto ba na //
NG0220:119: srid pa sngags kyi 'khor lo gnas //
NG0220:120: de yi rim pa 'di lta ste //
NG0220:121: srid pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud lnga //
NG0220:122: lto ba chos kyi pho brang hum //
NG0220:123: de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig ni //
NG0220:124: gsad pa drag po'i sngags kyis dgang *//
NG0220:125: gnyis pa 'khrul mig rtsa sbub brgyad //
NG0220:126: gnas pa ser ba'i sngags kyis dgang *//
NG0220:127: de yi phyi mig bcu gnyis la //
NG0220:128: yan lag sbyor ba'i drag sngags te //
NG0220:129: gshin rje ma mo bdud dang rgyal //
NG0220:130: zhi khro sri can gzir ba'i sngags //
NG0220:131: snying gzer gdug pa gzir ba'i sngags //
NG0220:132: pho mo ma ning 'pho ba'i sngags //
NG0220:133: bcu gnyis las kyi skabs kyi gnas //
NG0220:134: 'khrul mig bzhi la brda yis gang *//
NG0220:136: las kyi yan lag phral la ste //
NG0220:137: thun gyis gzugs la brdeg pa yin //
NG0220:138: mnan pa la sogs gong bzhin sbyar //
NG0220:139: a kro'i mtha' ru shis par gsungs //
NG0220:140: skabs dang sbyar la thun mong spyad //
NG0220:141: g.yeng min bde ba'i nyams kyis brtags //
NG0220:142: gdeng dang ldan na mchog tu bsngags //
NG0220:143: sngags kyi dbye ba 'di lta ste //
NG0220:144: he ka he tun rak+sha rbad /
NG0220:145: ya ma he sad rak+sha rbad /
NG0220:146: kha raka tsa thur rak+sha rbad /
NG0220:147: g+hus sma dza ni rak+sha rbad /
NG0220:148: thar kang sad ka ra ya dgra bo'i srog ma ra ya rbad /
NG0220:149: ya ma e ka ra dza 'dri ma nan //
NG0220:150: ma ha sang tsa ru ra nan /
NG0220:151: pra ma sa ra na ga thi sa ra nan /
NG0220:152: nri tri ra tsa ma ra ya rbad nan /
NG0220:153: e ka he ka e ma ke ya ma he
NG0220:154: sang pra ma khrag la phrom phrom hril shar shar
NG0220:155: drag tu phrom phrom shar shar hril b+h+yo /
NG0220:156: phrom shar shar ka ma da ri hril phrom /
NG0220:157: sa na ga tsit+ta ro myag phrom phrom shar shar trag tu hril snying gzer kham shag phob /
NG0220:158: e ka he ka 'dri me he kam tram yam
NG0220:159: he kam b+hi sa ma sma dzar kus ma dza
NG0220:160: ni / dza rang sad kar ya hum phat /
NG0220:161: e ka ya ma he ka 'dri ma ya rag mo rak+she ma b+h+yo /
NG0220:162: e ka ya ma he ka 'dri ma ya sarba tsit+ta gzer thum big+h+nam /
NG0220:163: e ka ya ma he sang sad ka ra ya
NG0220:164: dza ram rbad sarba sha trum nan gzir thun b+h+yo
NG0220:165: / e ka ya ma dun b+h+yo ka du dza
NG0220:166: ram ya ma sha trum sad ka ra ya thun
NG0220:168: e ka ya ma ka dun dza ram sad ka ra sha trum na gzir thun rbad /
NG0220:169: da ram sha trum sad ka ra ya rbad /
NG0220:170: ya ma he sang bra ma khrag tsa tri sha trum ram thun gzir rbad /
NG0220:171: he sang ya ma sad ka ra ya /
NG0220:172: sa na ga sha trum snying gzer hum rbad /
NG0220:173: ya ma ka dun dza ram sad ka ra ya /
NG0220:174: b+ha ti ya sha trum na kham nan thun gzir rbad /
NG0220:176: e ka he ka ya ma @#//
NG0220:178: rtsa ba 'dri ma thi ba ra na ga thun gzir rbad /
NG0220:179: e ka he ka na ga sbur nan /
NG0220:180: ar+ya ga ru na na ga ma ra ya nan /
NG0220:181: he bam thi pa ra na ga sbur nan /
NG0220:183: e ka ya ma du ma thi ba ra na ga thun gzir rbad 'dri ma dun dza /
NG0220:184: he sam ya ma dun ya ma nr-i sarba sho na ya nan /
NG0220:185: de dag las kyi sbyor ba kun //
NG0220:186: don ldan thabs kyi rgyal pos bya //
NG0220:187: dbang sdud sngags kyi sbyor ba kun //
NG0220:188: sku yi bsnyen ma mtha' ru sbyar //
NG0220:189: drag por sbyor na rang la nyen //
NG0220:190: rig pa'i stobs kyi phyag rgyas 'phang *//
NG0220:191: las rnams rtsa bar dril ba yin //
NG0220:192: drag sngags brgyad gnyis gcig gis rdzogs //
NG0220:193: drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:194: dbang sdud rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o //
NG0220:195: // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nges pa'i
NG0220:197: sbyor ba mi shes sbyor byed pa //
NG0220:198: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba ma shes na //
NG0220:199: btags la don gyi ngo bor 'dzin pa yis //
NG0220:200: mngal gyi grong khyer brgyud pa'i bdud kyis zin //
NG0220:201: thabs lam gsang ba'i don dang ldan gyur na //
NG0220:202: snang srid chags pa'i spyod pas me 'bar kyang *//
NG0220:203: gnyis med phyag rgyar grol ba'i 'bras bur bgrod //
NG0220:204: sgrol ba mi shes sgrol byed pa //
NG0220:205: skye shi med pa'i gdeng dang mi ldan na //
NG0220:206: rtsol bas sgrol ba mu stegs 'khrul pa ste //
NG0220:207: las kyi srin pos bcings pa'i bdud kyis zin //
NG0220:208: byar med rdzogs pas srog kyang gcad du med //
NG0220:209: ye shes chen po'i phyag rgyar rang grol na //
NG0220:210: khams gsum sems can dus gcig srog bcad kyang *//
NG0220:211: chos sku bde ba chen po bgrod pa med par rtogs //
NG0220:212: spyad du med pa'i phrin las ma shar na //
NG0220:213: dpe la mtshon byed lus med spyod pa ni //
NG0220:214: las kyi rnam smin dmyal ba'i btson rar tshud //
NG0220:215: rtsol ba byas pas rtag pa'i bdud kyis gzir //
NG0220:216: spyad du med pa'i phrin las spyod shes na //
NG0220:217: lha srin kun gyi ming dang mtshang smos nas //
NG0220:218: las la mngags nas pho nyar kun rbad kyang *//
NG0220:219: blang dor med pas rol pa'i spyod par dag / bsnyen bsgrub rtsol med sngags don ma shes na //
NG0220:220: phyi nang rtags la brten nas sgrub byed pa //
NG0220:221: mi shes srog la rtsol bas rang bdud rang la 'khor //
NG0220:222: mnar med dmyal ba'i gnas la the tshom med //
NG0220:223: bsnyen bsgrub rtsol med sngags kyi don shes na //
NG0220:224: srid gsum mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i srog dngas ma //
NG0220:225: lha srin kun gyi srog snying dril ba'i mchog / drag po e dang yan lag sbyor ba ni //
NG0220:226: rdo rje'i bzlas pas ye shes rol par shar //
NG0220:227: gang mthong ci spyad lhun grub mtha' gnyis grol //
NG0220:228: nam mkha' rin chen lhun po rgya mtsho ltar //
NG0220:229: don gnyis smin pa yon tan lhun gyis grub //
NG0220:230: ma bcings grol med bgrod pa'i 'bras bur smin //
NG0220:231: snang srid 'khrul pa dug lnga'i smag rum du //
NG0220:232: sangs rgyas bka' yi drag sngags ye shes nyi ma shar //
NG0220:235: ye shes gnyis med rang las chos skur gsal //
NG0220:236: drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:237: rtsol ba dang bral ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o
NG0220:238: // // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mgo
NG0220:239: dgu pa'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so //
NG0220:240: rnam grangs sbyor ba bzhi ru bkod //
NG0220:241: rnal ma'i 'khor lo spogs pa gnyis //
NG0220:242: lo tog gzhom dang bsrung ba'o //
NG0220:243: rnal ma'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste //
NG0220:244: dur khrod gdug pa'i bde gnas su //
NG0220:245: dur khrod ras la 'khor lo bri //
NG0220:246: sme ba lnga dang tsha ba bsku //
NG0220:247: dbus nas thig skor bzhi ru bskor //
NG0220:248: gru gsum zla kham lcags mkhar bzhi //
NG0220:249: mtshams bzhi rdo rje'i ka bas 'deg / thod pa'i ra ba brgyad gnyis ldan //
NG0220:250: phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu drug la //
NG0220:251: mtshams su rin chen ka ba de bzhin sa ri'i mtshams //
NG0220:252: de yi phyi rim sbrul gdug chun pos bskor //
NG0220:253: srid pa rus sbal khra bo'i lto na gnas //
NG0220:254: de dag dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni //
NG0220:255: dbus su brnag pa'i ming rus bri //
NG0220:256: zla kham gsum la pha mes dur du song ba yi //
NG0220:257: de bzhin brnag par bya ba'i snag tsha khrag gis bri //
NG0220:258: zla kham gcig la srung ba'i lha rnams bri //
NG0220:259: 'khrul mig bzhi la spu gri tshan bzhi dgod //
NG0220:260: de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la //
NG0220:261: drag po dbang sdud las kyi rgyal po gnyis //
NG0220:262: khro bo rngam pa'i sgra dang bdud kyi snying po gnyis //
NG0220:263: gshin rje nyid dang ma mo'i snying po gnyis //
NG0220:264: chags byed ma dang srin po'i snying po gnyis //
NG0220:265: shan pa btsan dang dmu yi snying po gnyis //
NG0220:266: shan pa las mkhan sgrol byed snying po gnyis //
NG0220:267: dregs pa can dang nam mkha'i snying po gnyis //
NG0220:268: srog bdag pho mo gsod pa'i snying po gnyis //
NG0220:269: rang rang lcags mkhar 'bar ba'i gnas de nas //
NG0220:270: drag tu bskul gyis shan pa dag la rbad //
NG0220:271: 'khor lo mtshon chen drag sngags me dbal drug / 'khrul 'khor me rlung spu gri thog chen 'dis //
NG0220:272: lus bshig rtsa gcad khrag dang bag chags skems //
NG0220:273: shes pa rten dang dbang po yul las 'byed //
NG0220:274: rten gcig lus la shes pa kun bsdus thim //
NG0220:275: kha sbyor 'khor lo thod pa ga bur gzhug / nyin mtshan dril gtor ming bcas spu gri sbyar //
NG0220:276: thod pa'i gseb tu thun gyi spu gri dgod //
NG0220:277: ri rgyal rbab dang gser gyi dgu thog ltar //
NG0220:278: sbrul gyi gseb tu gnan pa'i spu gri dgod //
NG0220:279: gser gyi sa gzhi ri rab brtan ltar bzlas //
NG0220:280: gru gsum nang du brnag pa'i rten rnams bzhag / mthing nag kha bcad gsad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam //
NG0220:281: brgyad dam bcu gnyis dril gtor drag sngags bzlas //
NG0220:282: sbyor ba thon nas thod pa gzir zhing bca' //
NG0220:283: ri rab pho brang gdug pa'i klu la gtad //
NG0220:284: nya stong kha gso thod khrag dug bza' 'phang *//
NG0220:285: drag po sngags kyi dmod pa 'di lta ste //
NG0220:286: e ka he dun ya ma rag sha ma dza mun tri /
NG0220:289: dgra bo'i srog la nr-i sha trum ma ra ya rbad /
NG0220:291: srog la nr-i shag rbad yam thun b+h+yo /
NG0220:292: me rlung sbyor ba las kyi mchog / rnal mas gsad pa'i sbyor ba yin //
NG0220:293: drag sngags mngon du phyur ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:294: rtsa ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o //  // gzhan yang gsad pa'i sbyor ba ni //
NG0220:295: ma grub spogs na lto dkrug bca' //
NG0220:296: ras la thig skor bzhi ru bskor //
NG0220:297: gru gsum zla kham ming rus lha //
NG0220:298: 'khrul mig bcu drug rtsa ba'i sngags //
NG0220:299: yang legs bcu drug spu gri mtshon //
NG0220:300: tha ma sbrul bzhi'i ra bas bskor //
NG0220:301: gcod cing gnon pa'i 'khor lo yin //
NG0220:302: bla sems 'chang ba drag po'i gnas //
NG0220:303: gdug pa sreg byed las kyi me //
NG0220:305: srog dbugs 'chad pa gshed gsang mdzod //
NG0220:306: rtsa gcod dbugs bral mtshon chen dug / srog dang las sdud ze yi lcags //
NG0220:307: dbang po gnon pa ri bo'i rbab //
NG0220:308: las sbyangs shes smin phyag rgya brtan //
NG0220:309: gdug pa'i mtshon cha ngar blud la //
NG0220:310: drag sngags lto dkrug khri brgyad gnyis //
NG0220:311: mtshan mo bskul gyin dril ba'i sngags //
NG0220:312: thon nas thod mkhar gdug pas gdab //
NG0220:313: thun khrag dug gzer kha gso bskyed //
NG0220:314: shes pa'i khyad par gsum ldan 'phang *//
NG0220:315: dbang po rno myur gsal 'phro sdud //
NG0220:316: gdeng gsum sngags skong rgyas par bgrod //
NG0220:317: drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste //
NG0220:318: e ka he dun rag sha ya ma tsa dza shu tri sham mug tri snying */
NG0220:319: dgra bo'i srog la yongs thums shig rbad /
NG0220:321: srog khyer yam shig hri thums myog thun b+h+yo /
NG0220:322: gzhan yang las kyi rim pa ni //
NG0220:323: sprul pas lo thog gzhom pa las //
NG0220:324: dur khrod ras sam shog bu la //
NG0220:325: thig skor rim pa gsum du bskor //
NG0220:326: dbus su gru gsum yul gyi ming *//
NG0220:327: zla gam sbyor ba gzhom pa bri //
NG0220:328: phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la //
NG0220:329: rtsa ba'i drag sngags rnal ma bkod //
NG0220:330: tha ma rtsib chen nyi shu la //
NG0220:331: dbab pa'i spu gri drag po dgod //
NG0220:332: rus sbal lto bar sbyor ba bsdu //
NG0220:333: kha sbyor thod pa zhabs mas gril //
NG0220:334: khrag sna dug sna sngo na brdeb //
NG0220:335: sprul pa'i bsgom gyin bskul la bzlas //
NG0220:336: sbyor ba thon nas gta' ma gzhug / drag sngags stong du rgyun mi gcad //
NG0220:337: ston zla gsum du dbab pa brtsam //
NG0220:338: zor dang du ba thab dang gzir //
NG0220:339: khrag dang dug rdzas sngo sna dug / lcags phur drag sngags khri bzhir ldan //
NG0220:340: gdug pa'i rten dang gzugs la brdeg / dregs pa kun gyi mthu dril ba'i //
NG0220:341: sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lta ste //
NG0220:342: e ka he dun yam yam sham dz+wa mun tri
NG0220:343: sham ram kring shu snying phroms phroms shar shar na
NG0220:344: ga hur nan phrom phrom shar shar hril hril drag
NG0220:345: tu phob phrom na ga dza yam snying gzir tsi
NG0220:346: ta nan phrom / shar shar hril b+h+yo /
NG0220:347: lo thog gzhom pa drag po'i las //
NG0220:348: thod pa stobs dang ldan pa'o //
NG0220:349: gzhan yang sprul pa'i tshe bdag gis //
NG0220:352: thams cad gcig tu dril ba'i las //
NG0220:353: shog bu gru bzhi cha mnyam la //
NG0220:355: srid pa'i rus sbal lto bar bri //
NG0220:356: dbus su gru gsum gang gnod bri //
NG0220:357: 'khrul mig bcu drug rtsa ba'i sngags //
NG0220:358: yang logs bcu bzhi spu gri rtsibs //
NG0220:359: las ni sna tshogs rtsa ba gcig / zla kham me tog bsrung ba'i 'bru //
NG0220:360: bcu bzhi bkod la skabs dang sbyar //
NG0220:361: khrag dang dug chu tsha ba bsku //
NG0220:362: thod pa dang bcas sbyor ba brtsam //
NG0220:363: zhag bdun sngags bzlas drag tu bskul //
NG0220:364: lha bsgom bka' rten 'og tu gnan //
NG0220:365: sngags kyi rtsa ba gnyis su bya //
NG0220:366: bcu drug bcu gnyis rno dang shis //
NG0220:367: rig pa stobs dang brda yis sbyar //
NG0220:368: drag sngags sbyor ba 'di lta ste //
NG0220:369: e ka he dun yam mam ra sham dza mu na dri sham ram kring shu /
NG0220:370: sarba du ram u nan gzer phyung sbur nan srog la myogs rbad /
NG0220:371: drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:372: yan lag gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o
NG0220:373: // // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag
NG0220:374: sngags yongs su smin pa'i don 'di gsungs so //
NG0220:375: e ma chos sku byang chub sems //
NG0220:376: skye 'gag med pa'i ngo bor gnas //
NG0220:377: ma bcos bde chen lhun gyis grub //
NG0220:378: ye shes thig le ngang la rdzogs //
NG0220:379: thabs kyi rgyal po rdo rje yis //
NG0220:380: gsang ba yongs su rdzogs pa yi //
NG0220:381: drag po sngags kyi dmod pa gdams //
NG0220:382: kun tu bgrod pa gsum gyis sbyang *//
NG0220:383: bde ba'i lam can gzhan las min / ye shes rig pa snang bar spyad //
NG0220:384: rgyud kyi rgyal po mngon phyung 'di //
NG0220:385: ma 'ongs dam ldan srung byed na //
NG0220:386: da yang dam las mi g.yel bsrung *//
NG0220:387: 'chi bdag dregs pa stobs can kun //
NG0220:388: dam tshig bka' yi 'khor lo srungs //
NG0220:389: e ma ho rig pa'i bka' rgyud 'di //
NG0220:390: bde ba'i lam can dag pa dang *//
NG0220:391: ma bsgribs lam la gnas pa dang *//
NG0220:393: rig pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang *//
NG0220:394: 'chi bdag dregs pa myos pa dang *//
NG0220:395: 'thoms pa'i tshogs dang khrag skyugs tshogs //
NG0220:396: phung byed mngag pa gdug pa'i tshogs //
NG0220:397: 'khor na gnas pa'i dam can kun //
NG0220:398: sangs rgyas bka' yi rgyud 'di zung *//
NG0220:399: gnyis med bgrod pa'i sa la gnas //
NG0220:400: rdo rje gtum po rdo rje'i tshogs //
NG0220:401: rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khrag 'thung dad //
NG0220:402: rdo rje gnod sbyin srin po dang *//
NG0220:403: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams kyang *//
NG0220:404: dam la gnas shing ma g.yel srungs //
NG0220:405: sangs rgyas bka' yi yon tan brjod mi lang *//
NG0220:406: che ba'i yon tan gsum dang gcig tu ldan //
NG0220:407: khro bo'i snying po dregs pa ma mo drag po dang *//
NG0220:408: bcu dang sum sgril rin chen phreng ba ltar *//
NG0220:409: dam par sbyar la gnyen po gcig tu bsgrub //
NG0220:410: dbang sdud phyag rgya chen po rang bzhin gzir //
NG0220:411: nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho me dang 'dra //
NG0220:412: dregs pa stobs chen phyag rgya brtan byas la //
NG0220:413: snying po bcu gnyis rtsa ba gcig tu @#//
NG0220:415: yan lag gang 'dod spu gri thems //
NG0220:416: gang rung sbyar na rin chen snying po 'bru //
NG0220:417: bstan pa gsum ldan bde ba gcig gi ngang *//
NG0220:418: snying po bcu gnyis mi 'gyur thig le la //
NG0220:419: bsrung ba'i rgyal po dmar len mtshon dang sbyar //
NG0220:420: gzir ba'i snying po gang yin mtshams su 'pho //
NG0220:421: rnam shes 'phrog pa 'bru gcig snying la bsdu //
NG0220:422: mtshon dpag dka' na skye med nam mkha' dbrog / shes la rgyang ring sbyor ba'i tshad dang ldan //
NG0220:423: 'bru brgyad rtsa ba gang dmigs spu grir ldan //
NG0220:424: 'dod pa'i don bzhi snying po gcad nas dbrog / nyes la gnod byed mtshon cha rang gcod de //
NG0220:425: man ngag ldan pas bde bar spyad na rno //
NG0220:426: rang sems stobs ldan ye shes rig pa'i rtsal //
NG0220:427: 'ching med grol bar thar pa'i lam mchog 'bras //
NG0220:428: de med rang 'ching mnar med sa la rings //
NG0220:429: thabs med spyod bral gdeng med bgrod ma thob //
NG0220:430: rtsa ba re dang yan lag brda' mi sbyor //
NG0220:431: sun 'byin grol med 'ching ba'i gnas las bgrod //
NG0220:432: blo yengs che ba'i yon tan bsam mi lang *//
NG0220:433: grol ba'i phyag rgya yang dag 'phags lam ldan //
NG0220:434: 'di de bde dang smin par byed pa'i mchog / gu h+ya tsit+ta so ma ha /
NG0220:435: yam bam ram lam tsa d+ha ri /
NG0220:436: na ga de wa rak+sha ma //
NG0220:437: ya ma ka yi bde ba'i klong *//
NG0220:438: a dang khyab ho pu shu ta //
NG0220:439: ye shes rig pa'i klong du brdal //
NG0220:440: 'di dag bde ba'i lam can de //
NG0220:441: smin cing bgrod pa'i thabs mchog rgyal //
NG0220:442: a yi ye shes las byung ba //
NG0220:443: skye med rnam dag chos skur gsal //
NG0220:444: e yi ye shes las byung ba //
NG0220:445: drag po sreg byed nam mkhar gsal //
NG0220:446: sangs rgyas skye ba'i cho 'phrul lo //
NG0220:447: bde ba'i lam can snying po kun las 'das //
NG0220:448: nor bu gser ldan rin chen rgyal sa thob //
NG0220:449: bka' yi bden pa bde ba'i ngang la bzhag / ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la /
NG0220:450: 'khor rnams rjes su yi rang ste mngon par bstod do //
NG0220:451: 'khor de dag gis bden pa mthong bar gyur to //
NG0220:452: drag sngags mngon du phyung ba'i rgyud las /
NG0220:453: rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig
NG0220:454: pa'o // // dpal gshin rje'i rgyud khri drug stong
NG0220:455: pa nas / drag po rno dbal mtshon cha'i skabs bton pa'o //
